N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 143.7 - Amount and payment of shift pay differentials

State Regulations

The amount of a shift pay differential shall be determined by
the Director of Classification and Compensation, with the approval of the

Director of the Budget. In cases where the amount of the shift pay differential
for a given class of work is not the same for all shifts other than the normal
day shift, employees will be paid the amount of differential which has been
authorized for work on the shift to which they are regularly assigned as
defined in 143.1 (e) above. An employee re-assigned to work regularly on
another shift for which a different shift pay differential has been authorized
shall be paid the amount of the shift pay differential authorized for work on
the shift to which he is so re-assigned. Notes
